name: Backrooms Noclip VR
description:
this is a game about the backrooms(i know shocker)

explore the levels trying to escape

the levels in the game are threwally thought of and planned, with big content

use objects, and guns to help you, and get chased by entites

game is mainly inspired by the backrooms game brvr on steam

more will be add soon

join the discord for spoilers and to make suggestions: https://discord.gg/4prdbG84Ec

report bugs, it an't perfect
